short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See exact % of progress of Udemy courses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you like to see exactly how much you have progressed in your Udemy courses, this extension is for you.

As bonus, see course total time, total time completed and how long it takes to progress 1%
